email.title: Email
email.description: This is for further communication on the Kin Mentorship Program next steps and will be shared with your Mentor/fellow Mentee after the matching process is complete plus AAD programming for 2023 and beyond

phoneNumber.title: Phone Number
phoneNumber.description: This information will be shared/used for when your Mentor reaches out to you and your fellow Mentee for scheduling the 4 additional meetings plus the AAD team may have to support in communication as needed

linkedInProfile.title: LinkedIn Profile
linkedInProfile.description: this will be shared to both Volunteer Mentors and Q3 Mentees for networking purposes

ethnicityLevel1.title: How would you best describe yourself? (Pan Asian American preferred)

enum: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

ethnicityLevel2.title: How would you best describe yourself?

background.title: Select which option(s) apply to you
background.description: Preferred one of the following applies to you

stateOfResidency.title: What is your state of Residency?

schoolYear.title: What year of college are you in?
schoolYear.description: Please answer in the format (years in college/total years expected in college). Ex. Junior is (3/4). This information will be shared with potential Mentors to support the matching process

schoolState.title: What state is your college/university located in?
schoolState.description: This information will be shared with potential Mentors to support the matching process

expectations.title: What are you looking for in a Mentor and or specifically, what help/guidance are you looking for from them during this Q3 Kin Mentorship Program? Please explain.

hadMentor.title: Have you ever had a mentor before?
